name: Adventures in ADHD - a D&D 5e Module
name_original: Adventures in ADHD - a D&D 5e Module
description:
May I have your attention, please?

Such and innocent question, until the fey who asks it quite literally walks away with your attention. Now you must journey into the magical, whimsical Fey realm of Lotstoodoo, to get it back! Adventure in ADHD educates players about ADHD in a diverse, inclusive environment while following a fantastic adventure though the Fey Domains of Delight.

See you in the Feywild!

Containing a Feywild adventure with 20 side quests, 20 NPCs, creatures, spells and more.
